text: NGC 6027 is a lenticular galaxy. It is the brightest member of the Seyfert's Sextet, a compact galaxy group. It is located 190 million light years away from Earth in the constellation of Serpens. It was discovered by Ã‰douard Stephan in 1882. == Related pages == * Seyfert's Sextet == References == Category:Lenticular galaxies
title: NGC 6027
